FAQ

cRUISEFlight
  • Do I need a passport?

    For US citizens many popular cruise destinations, such as Caribbean, Alaska and Western Mediterranean, do not require visas. But visa might be necessary if you are taking a cruise ship that calls on more exotic destinations. Please talk to one of our support agent for a more nuanced answer.

  • Do I need a Visa?

    For US citizens many popular cruise destinations, such as Caribbean, Alaska and Western Mediterranean, do not require visas. But visa might be necessary if you are taking a cruise ship that calls on more exotic destinations. Please talk to one of our support agent for a more nuanced answer.

  • Can I cancel my ticket?

    For US citizens many popular cruise destinations, such as Caribbean, Alaska and Western Mediterranean, do not require visas. But visa might be necessary if you are taking a cruise ship that calls on more exotic destinations. Please talk to one of our support agent for a more nuanced answer.

  • What if I miss my cruise ship?

    For US citizens many popular cruise destinations, such as Caribbean, Alaska and Western Mediterranean, do not require visas. But visa might be necessary if you are taking a cruise ship that calls on more exotic destinations. Please talk to one of our support agent for a more nuanced answer.

  • Can I book tickets online?

    For US citizens many popular cruise destinations, such as Caribbean, Alaska and Western Mediterranean, do not require visas. But visa might be necessary if you are taking a cruise ship that calls on more exotic destinations. Please talk to one of our support agent for a more nuanced answer.

About us

We’ve been in the travel industry for three generations and we truly love every part of it. Our passion for travel drives us to deliver the ultimate experience for our clients, be it a cruise to Alaska or a flight to Tanzania, our aim always stays true, to eliminate the hassle of booking so you can look forward to the best part of your journey. No matter what corner of the world you want to explore, we got your back.

Sign up for special prices, frequent discounts, exclusive offers, and other perks!
